I have been permanently disabled for my entire adult life and $450k is still less than I received in the last 23 years from SSI to live off of. I am very resourceful and budget minded, as well as grateful that I have a safe home but this is such a smack in the face to millions of veterans, elderly and other disabled people who live off of as much as I do and share the same struggles. Not only that but the legitimately disabled people that fight for YEARS for a poverty level check just so they are (hopefully) not homeless at the very least.
